msbt.message: Yo, I was wonderin' Anyone tell you about Reactions yet, ?I mean like, when you feel full of Joy and your body just starts moving on its own. Like I'm doin' now!Words ain't always up to snuff when it comes to expressin' yourself. Sometimes only Reactions will do.For times like that, you wanna press î‚§ and let everyone know how you feel. Easy, right?OK, I'm gonna tell the others to teach you any sweet Reactions they know, so don't forget to hit them up!

Y'know what? I think you're ready to learn one of my favorite Reactions. I'm gonna teach you Ah! Let's do Laughter! You ready?BWAAAH-HA-HA-HA!That's what laughing from the gut looks like! Really clears the head. Give it a whirl, !

Ever hear a story so creepy that you get a Cold Chill right down to your bones, ?One of my favorite Reactions is PERFECT for that. Watch!So alright, speaking of bones Did you know we settled on top of an ancient burial ground?That's rightthere's dinosaur bones all over the place if you know where to look. Which meansdino ghosts!

Hmm. I was gonna help you out with one of the more useful Reactions today, butuhI'm kinda stumped. Sorry about that, .Hang on, did you not know how to do Apologetic? Wow! That was lucky. Sorry I didn't teach you sooner

Yo, . You ever have a hard time putting your foot down about somethin'?If someone won't listen to what you're sayin', you gotta have the right Reactions ready. Like this!No. Nuh-uh. Nothin' doin'.And just like that, you've hit 'em with Disagreement. You gotta stand your ground sometimes, .

OK! Reactions. Check it out.I don't bust this one out for just anybody, but you and me are cool, .When your buddy's feelin' low and you wanna get 'em fired up, this one never fails! Ready?KA-BAM! Didja get that?Being Confident is contagious! Show someone you're ridin' high, and they'll rise to meet you there!
